definitions.definition: The ancient Greek theory that all matter is composed of very small indestructible and indivisible particles .
The doctrine that society arises from individuals and that larger structures are unimportant.

main_definition: ( philosophy ) The ancient Greek theory that all matter is composed of very small indestructible and indivisible particles .
secondary_definitions: ( philosophy ) The doctrine that society arises from individuals and that larger structures are unimportant.
